text: Disagree with this point, though want to ensure that we at least have common margins
*paragraph widths

hey <@U026AP8CM> and <@U0265G76F>, on the login page for galapagos there are links to contact abby or scott if you’re having trouble logging in. Is there anyone like that at trapit, or do you think there will be so few people using the CMS that we don’t need that?
asking david now
thx
keep as the same
delete abby
have it go to <mailto:trapithelp@uncorkedstudios.com|trapithelp@uncorkedstudios.com> david's working on setting up the email address
sorry a bit of mixed messages there
let's have it go to trapithelp@uncorked
so yeah - we’re going to set up an uncorked email address
and have it forward to a couple people
chances are they’ll never need it
and chances are if they do, hank will just Skype me
ok cool i’ll just change it to that email
thanks!
<mailto:trapithelp@uncorkedstudios.com|trapithelp@uncorkedstudios.com> is now set up officially
thanks
thanks david

[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/542be2bc2a05201c545d6b10230e644348798f7d|542be2bc2a05>: Added thank you bg image.
 - gastonfig
<@U0260V1BX> re: the fixed bg on iOS, we have 2 possible options: 1. Add a flat color bg, 2. Make it fixed on homepage bg but normal (not fixed) on both sign up forms. Not sure which one works best.
how would #2 solve what we're currently seeing?
There's a hack we can use for 1 bg img that applies to the entire page but it doesn't work for elements like the sign up forms.
oh, then lets ditch the sign up form fixed bg, i dont care about that :grinning:
can we still give that a BG that's not fixed?
Yes.
awesome. let's do that.
Perfect. Thanks!
The fix's on the dev site now. Seems to work well on both iPhone and iPad.
Can you take a look and see if it looks good.
yes
Cool
<@U0260V1BX> this is what's happening on iPhone
<http://cl.ly/1d2e1i0G0K1f/trapit-phone.mov>
There doesn't seem to be a simple solution. Wondering if we can have a different layout for phone size devices
Or different background styles.
